sentence.Network_en: Vanadium seldom forms mineral deposit. It is mainly exist in vanadium titanomagnetite coal gangue and claystone.
sentence.Network_cn: 钒一般很少单独形成矿床, 它主要赋存于钒钛磁铁矿、石煤矿、粘土岩中.

sentence.Network_en: Coupled unsaturated flow in claystone has high effect on strength and stability of underground engineering.
sentence.Network_cn: 非饱和渗流、应力耦合行为是影响粘土类工程岩体的强度和稳定性的重要因素.
